system.effect: A bloody and very painful-looking furrow is opened up in the target's arm. He suffers Blood Loss and drops anything he was holding in that hand. The arm is Useless until the target receives medical attention.

description.value:
Rending Damage to Arm (Severity 5)

A bloody and very painful-looking furrow is opened up in the target's arm. He suffers Blood Loss and drops anything he was holding in that hand. The arm is Useless until the target receives medical attention.
